name: MISONR BCS Section RoSH
description: OAS0026 v1.0 Report to show BCS RoSH answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Section RoSH
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.RECEPTION_DATE, BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.INITIATION_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.SERIOUS_OFFENCE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.RESTRAINING_ORDER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.SIGNIFICANT_EVENTS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.CHILD_CONCERNS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.SUICIDE_RISK, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.SELF_HARM_RISK, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.VULNERABILITY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.CURRENT_ACCT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED FROM ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, BCS_PART_STATUS, OFFENDER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SCREENING.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN (SELECT LOCATION FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Physical Location:','A','Offender History\Physical Location',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start', 'Basic Custody Screening - Review'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT_ID, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITIATION_DATE, SERIOUS_OFFENCE, RESTRAINING_ORDER, SIGNIFICANT_EVENTS, CHILD_CONCERNS, DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE, SUICIDE_RISK, SELF_HARM_RISK, VULNERABILITY, CURRENT_ACCT, ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN SERIOUS_OFFENCE = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN SERIOUS_OFFENCE = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_ROSH_SERIOUS_OFFENCE, CASE WHEN RESTRAINING_ORDER = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN RESTRAINING_ORDER = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN RESTRAINING_ORDER = 2 THEN 'Further Checks Required' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS V_ROSH_RESTRAINING_ORDER, CASE WHEN CHILD_CONCERNS = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN CHILD_CONCERNS = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN CHILD_CONCERNS = 2 THEN 'Further Checks Required' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS V_ROSH_CHILD_CONCERNS, CASE WHEN DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE CASE WHEN DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE = 2 THEN 'Further Checks Required' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END END AS V_ROSH_DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE, CASE WHEN VULNERABILITY = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN VULNERABILITY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_ROSH_VULNERABILITY, CASE WHEN CURRENT_ACCT = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN CURRENT_ACCT = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_ROSH_CURRENT_ACCT, CASE WHEN ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_ROSH_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_OFFENDER_SURNAME
field.display: BR1 To your knowledge, has the offender ever been convicted of any serious offence? Blackmail, Harassment, Stalking, Child neglect/abuse, Abuse of a vulnerable adult, Child pornography (inc possession), Abduction, Death by dangerous driving, Terrorist offences, or Serious organised crime?

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_SERIOUS_OFFENCE
field.display: BR2 Is offender subject to any restraining orders?

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_RESTRAINING_ORDER
field.display: BR5 Have there been any significant events in the past?
field.legacySql: =If([Restraining Order]=0;"No";(If([Restraining Order]=1;"Yes";(If([Restraining Order]=2;"Further Checks Required";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_SIGNIFICANT_EVENTS
field.display: BR7 Are there any concerns in relation to children?

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_CHILD_CONCERNS
field.display: BR8 Is there evidence the offender is a perpetrator of domestic violence?
field.legacySql: =If([Child Concerns]=0;"No";(If([Child Concerns]=1;"Yes";(If([Child Concerns]=2;"Further Checks Required";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE
field.display: BR9 From what you know about this offender have there been or are there currently any concerns about risk of suicide?
field.legacySql: =If([Domestic Violence]=0;"No";(If([Domestic Violence]=1;"Yes";(If([Domestic Violence]=2;"Further Checks Required";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_SUICIDE_RISK
field.display: BR10 From what you know about this offender have there been or are there currently any concerns about risk of self harm?

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_SELF_HARM_RISK
field.display: BR11 From what you know about this offender have there been or are there currently any concerns about vulnerability?
field.legacySql: =If([Self Harm Risk]=0;"No";(If([Self Harm Risk]=1;"Yes";(If([Self Harm Risk]=2;"Don't Know";"Not Answered")))))

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_VULNERABILITY
field.display: BR12 Is there a current ACCT (Assessment, Care in Custody and Teamwork)?

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_CURRENT_ACCT
field.display:
BR13 Is RoSH an issue which needs addressing? 
[For the screener to consider]

field.name: $ref:V_ROSH_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED
field.legacySql: =If([Issue To Be Addressed]=0;"No";(If([Issue To Be Addressed]=1;"Yes";"Not Answered")))
